thread.title: Kansas City beats Toronto, advances to World Series
thread.title_full: Kansas City beats Toronto, advances to World Series

author: Dana Gooley
title: Kansas City beats Toronto, advances to World Series
text:
Home » News » Sports » MLB » Kansas City beats Toronto,… Kansas City beats Toronto, advances to World Series By Dana Gooley  22 am 
WASHINGTON– The Kansas City Royals are returning to the World Series. They topped Toronto 4-3 to clinch the American League Championship Series 4-games-to-2. 
Lorenzo Cain scored from first on a single by Eric Hosmer to snap a 3-3 tie in the 8 th . The Blue Jays had tied the game in the top of the inning on a 2-run homer by Jose Bautista, his second homerun of the game. 
The game ended with the Jays stranding runners on second and third. 
Kansas City will now host the first two games of the World Series against the New York Mets starting Tuesday.
